name: Yggdrasil (Demo)
description:
This is a short demo of my game Yggdrasil.

This game just shows the potential of what would this look like in the future. Some concepts and mechanics may change. And there's not much story in the game yet.

Around 2-3 minutes to complete, extremely easy and straightforward gameplay.

But! Beware of flashing lights. And dark backgrounds! If you're uncomfortable to that...

JRPG elements includes:

  • Turn-based combat
  • Topdown adventure
  • Story

That's all! You could find this game in my other channel with this link: armanlone.itch.io/yggdrasil

Special thanks to Tronimal for the Background Music used.

Controls are only available for Keyboard (PC) and Touchscreen (Smarthphones)

Alt = Select

Arrow Keys = Movement

Rom version will be available later on the other channel (link above).
